properties.description: We know many people are struggling with rising energy bills this winter, and thatâ€™s why we are holding these free sessions to give you extra support during the cold months. Enjoy a hot drink and biscuit, and meet other participants while enjoying optional, informal, social activities like table tennis, indoor curling, board games and short exercise activities.

properties.description: A safe space and a warm welcome await you at The Hive LGBT+ Centre in Kirkcaldy, welcoming all LGBT+ people from across Fife. Free soup or stovies are served each day from the cafe and a range of fresh dairy, vegetables and dry foods are available from our community fridge. Groups and activities are on every evening or why not have a game of pool for 50p!
